amendment.description: Amendment sought to make a technical correction to clarify that all units of the National Park System, not just National Parks and National Monuments, are exempt from the provisions of Title I. National Park System units currently open for hunting or recreational shooting would not be affected.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-444 to make a technical correction to clarify that all units of the National Park System, not just National Parks and National Monuments, are exempt from Title I. National Park System units currently open for hunting or recreational shooting would not be affected.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 260 (Roll no. 158).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Holt.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Holt amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 260 (Roll no. 158).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
